metadata.title: CVE-2018-19519 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In tcpdump 4.9.2, a stack-based buffer over-read exists in the print_prefixfunction of print-hncp.c via crafted packet data because of missinginitialization.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
